document_data.name: Thaddath farm
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thaddath farm''' was a small ruined structure located in the village of [[Eveningstar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The farm was located on the northern outskirts of Eveningstar.
document_data.Description: The Thaddath farm had a barn and a small stone tower house. The barn was half burned and sagging.
document_data.History: The farm lay vacant since the Thaddath family died out during the early-to-mid 14{{th}} century DR. The vacant stone tower was once a popular spot for young lovers to meet in secret, but was later used as a dump and midden for the village.
